SELECT CODE_IDX /*코드 INDEX */ , IFNULL(P_CODE , ' ' ) AS P_CODE /*부모코드 */ , IFNULL(CODE , ' ' ) AS CODE /*코드명 */ , IFNULL(CODE_VALUE , ' ' ) AS CODE_VALUE /*코드VALUE */ , IFNULL(DESCRIPT , ' ' ) AS DESCRIPT /*Description */ , IFNULL(SORT , ' ' ) AS SORT /*정렬 */ , IFNULL(ROOT_YN , ' ' ) AS ROOT_YN /*최상위 여부 */
FROM DC_COMMON_CODE WHERE P_CODE = #{pCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CODE_IDX ASC

SELECT CODE_IDX /*코드 INDEX */ , IFNULL(RT_CODE , '' ) AS RT_CODE /*최상위코드 */ , IFNULL(P_CODE , '' ) AS P_CODE /*부모코드 */ , IFNULL(CODE , '' ) AS CODE /*코드명 */ , IFNULL(CODE_VALUE , '' ) AS CODE_VALUE /*코드VALUE */ , IFNULL(DESCRIPT , '' ) AS DESCRIPT /*Description */ , IFNULL(SORT , '' ) AS SORT /*정렬 */ , IFNULL(ROOT_YN , '' ) AS ROOT_YN /*최상위 여부 */ FROM DC_COMMON_CODE WHERE P_CODE = #{pCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RT_CODE = #{rtCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CODE_IDX ASC

SELECT MI_IDX /* 메인 이미지 IDX */ , IFNULL(MI_IMG_IDX , '' ) AS MI_IMG_IDX /* 이미지 */ , IFNULL(MI_START_DT , '' ) AS MI_START_DT /* 이미지 시작기간 */ , IFNULL(MI_END_DT , '' ) AS MI_END_DT /* 이미지 종료기간 */ , IFNULL(MI_TITLE , '' ) AS MI_TITLE /* 이미지 제목 */ FROM DC_MAIN_IMG WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= MI_START_DT AND MI_END_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
